title: Saturday Feeling: How AI is rewriting the script in Indian cinema
description: Artificial Intelligence has made deep inroads into Indian cinema without the audience really noticing. It's transforming the filmmaking process but are directors asking questions about the changes AI is making to the art form?
content: In a surprisingly short period of time, Artificial Intelligence has ripped into every aspect of life, business, arts, leisure, society, entertainment. Every so often, Lounge reports on the chatbots that are replacing partners, friends, family and wor... [2770 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Meta's Temporary Restriction on AI Characters for Teens
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters
description: Meta is halting teens' access to artificial intelligence characters, at least temporarily, the company said in a blog post Friday. Meta Platforms Inc.
content:

title: The Case Against Declaring Artificial General Intelligence
description: ZeroHedge - On a long enough timeline, the survival rate for everyone drops to zero

title: MP Satnam Sandhu launches AI portal for citizen engagement
description: Member of Parliament (Rajya Sabha) Satnam Singh Sandhu has launched an AI-enabled web portal aimed at transforming citizen engagement by enabling the collection and analysis of public opinions, suggestions and grievances through advanced artificial intelligence (AI) tools.
content: Speaking at the launch of his official portal, https://satnamsandhu.in/, Sandhu said the platform has been designed to ensure “smart” detection of emerging public issues and timely redressal of grievances across all sections of society. He explained ... [1838 chars]

title: How Austin Public Schools is using artificial intelligence
description: Austin Public Schools outlines new AI classroom rules, from AI-free work to AI-empowered projects, to protect students, uphold academic honesty, and train staff for ethical use.
content: One of the main components of these guidelines is the AI Classroom Usage Continuum, which gives both students and staff a common way to talk about how AI should be used in their work. At the AI-Free level, everyone completes tasks on their own with n... [2140 chars]

title: Experts Are Warning That ‘AI Swarms’ Could Spark Disruptions to Democracy
description: Artificial intelligence is a powerful business tool, but also packs the potential for serious civic harm.
content:
AI researchers are already warning that upcoming election seasons could be rife with AI-powered misinformation campaigns capable of threatening democracy.
“A disruptive threat is emerging: swarms of collaborative, malicious AI agents,” according to a... [1290 chars]

title: Canada’s sovereignty a key topic as Liberal cabinet ministers meet
description: Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon said ministers are focused on creating good jobs for Canadians and building 'a safe, sovereign and secure, strong economy.'
content:
